supplied: rocaḥ putraḥ; rocasya rājño mānuṣyāṇām ehikā ehikā iti saṁjñodapādi; rocasya gautamā kalyāṇaḥ putraḥ; kalyāṇasya rājño mānuṣyāṇāṁ tilakās tilakā iti saṁjñodapādi; kalyāṇasya gautamā varakalyāṇaḥ putraḥ varakalyāṇasya gautamā rājño mānuṣyāṇām

jagataḥ, iyaṁ paścimā dik, mama paścimaṁ janma bhaviṣyati; iyam uttarā dik, bhavasaṁsārād utttariṣyāmi iti; tasya śirasi upari devāḥ śvetaṁ ca chatraṁ maṇidaṇḍakaṁ ca cāmaraṁ ca dhārayanti; dharmatā khalu sāṁpratajātasya bodhisatvasya dve vāridhāre ’ntarikṣāt prādurbhavata ekā śitā ekā uṣṇā ye bodhisatvaṁ snāpitavatye
yannu vayam apy atra balaṁ jijñāsayemaḥ
iti; tato bodhisatvaḥ sārathim āmantrayate: aṅga tāvat sārathe kṣipraṁ bhadraṁ yānaṁ yojaya yatrābhiruhyodyānabhūmiṁ gacchāmi;
niryāsyāmi iti; tato bodhisatvaḥ sārathim āmantrayate: aṅga tāvat sārathe kṣipraṁ bhadraṁ yānaṁ yojaya yatrāham abhiruhyodyānabhūmiṁ

gap: Here there is a gap of about one leaf due to an error of the scribe. The Tib. Transl. That covers this gap has been reproduced below in facsimile, as the Appendix.

supplied: tāny evārdhatṛtīyāni śatāni pāyitani; tatas tāny ardhatṛtīyāni śātāni dohayitvā
tad eva pañcaviṁśatyuttaraṁ śataṁ pāyitam; tataḥ tat pañcaviṁśatyuttaraṁ śataṁ dohayitvā
te svakam api bāhuṁ pragṛhītaṁ na paśyanti

evaṁ yā kācid vedanā yā kācit saṁjñā ye kecit saṁskārā yat kiṁcid vijñānam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmaṁ vā bāhyaṁ vā audārikaṁ vā sūkṣmaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā praṇītaṁ vā yad vā dūre yad vāntike tat sarvaṁ naitan mama, naiso ’ham asmi, naiṣa me ātmeti; evam etat yathābhūtaṁ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyam;
kiṁ punar vaḥ kumārakās tayā striyā

gap: The ff. of the manuscript between 398 and 405 are missing. Some fragments in Sanskrit concerning this portion of the Saṅghabhedavastu have been edited and restored with the aid of the Tibetan translation by Prof. Ernst Waldschmidt, Catuṣpariṣatsūtra, ed. cit, vol. III, Vorgang 23, 18–27 c 3 (pp. 235–337). The portion restored by Prof. Ernst Waldschmidt has been reproduced below as the Appendix II

supplied: tā devatā punar avocan: mahārāja na te pāpaṁ karma kṛtam; api tu

utthāyāsanād ekāṁśam uttarāsangaṁ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṁs tenāñjaliṁ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat: adhivāsayatu me bhagavāṁś śvo ’ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṁ bhikṣusaṅghena: adhivāsayati bhagavān rājño māgadhasya śreṇyasya bimbisārasya tūṣṇimbhāvena;

gap: Here there is a leaf missing, seemingly because of an error of the scribe himself.

supplied: rogī durbalaḥ; mama bhojanaṁ bhuktaṁ na kāyaṁ chādayati;
dāsaḥ syāt preṣyo nirdeśyo bhujiṣyo nayenakāmagaḥ; so ’pareṇa samayena na dāsaḥ syāt preṣyo bhujiṣyo nayenakāmagaḥ; tasya evaṁ syād: aham asmi pūrvaṁ dāsaḥ preṣyo nirdeśyo
67. tadyathā puruṣo bandhanāgāre baddho paścādbāhugāḍhabandhanabaddhaḥ; sa ca tato muktaḥ svastikṣemābhyām avyayena; tasyaivaṁ syād: yaḥ pūrvaṁ bandhanāgāre baddho

68. tadyathā puruṣaḥ sapratibhayo bhūtvā sukhī bhavati; durbhikṣaṁ pratipādayitvā pratipādayati subhikṣaṁ; tasyaivaṁ syād: aham asmi sukhī sapratibhayo bhūtvā; yasya me durbhikṣam abhūd etarhi bhavati
tadyathā ṛṇaṁ rogaṁ dāsyaṁ bandhanāgāraṁ kāntāraṁ prahāya samanupaśyati; imāni paṁcavaraṇāni cittopakleśakarāṇi
pāpakair akuśaladharmaiḥ savitarkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ prītisukhaṁ prathamaṁ dhyānam upasaṁpadya viharati; sa imam eva kāyaṁ vivekajaṁ prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati
70. tadyathā dakṣiṇo rajako rajakāntevāsī vā <span class='gap'>###

na pragharati na niścarati; evam eva sa imam eva kāyaṁ vivekajena prītasukhenābhiṣyandayati pariṣyandayati paripariprīṇāti parispharati; nāsya kiṁcit sarvataḥ kāyād asphuṭaṁ bhavaty aspharaṇīyaṁ yaduta vivekajaṁ prītisukhena
hārāja na tv evaṁ sati bhagavatā darśitaṁ sāndṛṣṭikaṁ śrāmaṇyaphalam
upasaṁpadya viharati; sa imam eva kāyaṁ samādhijena prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati pariṣyandayati pariprīṇāti parispharati; nāsya kiṁcit sarvataḥ
udakākodā udakaśulpo vā sarvaṁ tam udakahradaṁ śītalena vāriṇābhiṣyandayet pariṣyandayet paripūrayet parispharayet; na kiṁcit sarvata
prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati pariṣyandayati pariprīṇāti parispharati; nāsya kiṁcit sarvataḥ kāyād asphuṭaṁ bhavaty aspharaṇīyaṁ yaduta samādhijena
evaṁ sati bhagavatā darśitaṁ sāndṛṣṭikaṁ śrāmaṇyaphalam

eva kāyaṁ niṣprītikena sukhena abhiṣyandayati pariṣyandayati pariprīṇāti parispharati; nāsya kiṁcit sarvataḥ kāyād asphuṭaṁ bhavaty aspharaṇīyaṁ

ca prahāṇād duḥhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor aṣṭaṁgamād aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṁ caturthaṁ dhyānam upasaṁpadya viharati; sa imam eva kāyaṁ pariśuddhacittena paryavadātena adhimucya spharitvopasaṁpadya viharati; nāsya kiṁcit sarvataḥ kāyād asphuṭaṁ bhavaty aspharaṇīyaṁ yaduta pariśuddhena cittena paryavadātena
evam eva imam eva kāyaṁ pariśuddhena cittena paryavadātenādhimucya spharitvā upasaṁpadya viharati; nāsya kiṁcit sarvataḥ kāyād asphuṭaṁ bhavaty aspharaṇīyaṁ yaduta pariśuddhena cittena paryavadātena
kiṁ manyase mahārāja na tv evaṁ sati mayā darśitaṁ sāndṛṣṭikaṁ śrāmaṇyaphalam<span class='gap'>?

77. yasmin samaye mahārāja āryaśrāvakaḥ sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayor aṣṭaṁgamād aduḥkham asukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṁ caturthaṁ dhyānam upasaṁpadya viharati, tasya cittaṁ tasmin
